data.what_is:
Introducing La Growth Machine, the first multi-channel prospecting platform that allows you to engage in conversations with potential customers on LinkedIn, Email, and Twitter.

With La Growth Machine, you can:

- Import leads from LinkedIn or a CSV file to easily manage your prospecting efforts.
- Enrich your contact's profile with their details, including professional and personal email addresses, phone numbers, LinkedIn and Twitter profiles, to gain valuable insights about your prospects.
- Build a multi-channel prospecting sequence to effectively engage with your leads across multiple touchpoints.
- Automatically synchronize interactions in your CRM (including native integrations with HubSpot and Pipedrive or with Zapier) to keep your sales and marketing efforts organized and streamlined.

Using La Growth Machine can save your sales, marketing and recruitment teams time and increase productivity by simplifying your lead generation and management efforts.

Don't believe us? Sign up for a free trial of LaGrowthMachine today and see the benefits for yourself!
data.product_description:
La Growth Machine let Sales team get more meetings. Create multi-channel workflows to engage with your leads on LinkedIn, Twitter & by Email. 

- Import your contacts from a wide range of sources : SalesNavigator, CSV files, etc. to build your audiences.
- Easily build highly personalized prospection routines on LinkedIn, Twitter, emails and more, to reach your targets and engage conversation with your leads across all channels!
- Use LaGrowthMachine to enrich profiles with scrapped data from other networks: phone, email, twitter, website, workplace, and much more.
- Update your CRM with the latest interactions automated by LaGrowthMachine. Last message sent on Linkedin, tweet liked or mail replied automatically logged in my CRM. No more wasted time.

plan_features: Enrich Leads to find their Email, Phone, Twitter...

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 12 La Growth Machine reviews. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores This feature was mentioned in 10 La Growth Machine reviews.

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: As reported in 10 La Growth Machine reviews. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: As reported in 11 La Growth Machine reviews. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward. This feature was mentioned in 10 La Growth Machine reviews.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: Email Tracking/Automation
features.content: Based on 31 La Growth Machine reviews. Integrates tightly with email inbox and allows the scheduling and tracking of email outreach and correspondence.

features.name: Calls and Voice
features.content: As reported in 22 La Growth Machine reviews. Provides sales dialer functionality or integrates tightly with dialer software, with useful automation and high-quality calls.

features.name: Other Outreach Options
features.content: Based on 28 La Growth Machine reviews. Provides relevant automation in sales channels outside of email and calls, like social media posts, SMS text messages and more.

features.name: CRM Integration
features.content: As reported in 26 La Growth Machine reviews. Provides two-way integration with sales CRM: (1) Tracking sales team actions and prospect responses and (2) Pulling CRM data to populate and personalize sales outreach.

features.name: Calendar
features.content: As reported in 16 La Growth Machine reviews. Integrates with calendar software so users can seamlessly schedule calls.

features.name: Shared Records
features.content: Based on 19 La Growth Machine reviews. Automatically assign strategic leads and accounts to individual reps in a shared bucket for anyone to work on.

features.name: Content Management
features.content: Retains and incorporates company-approved messaging and presentations into emails, calls, meetings, etc. This feature was mentioned in 23 La Growth Machine reviews.

features.name: Workflow Management
features.content: Based on 26 La Growth Machine reviews. Orchestrates automated sales tasks and outreach across a number of channels (email, calls, social media, etc.) and/or integrated systems.

features.name: Workflow Performance
features.content: Reports on the effectiveness of an entire outreach workflow as well as the effectiveness of specific marketing materials, messaging, outreach tactics, and team members. This feature was mentioned in 26 La Growth Machine reviews.

features.name: Sales Coaching and Insights
features.content: Based on 24 La Growth Machine reviews. Surfaces relevant insights about how a team member can perform better, either with improved sales techniques or prospect-specific hints.

features.name: Gamification
features.content: Provides gamifaction features to rank sales reps on performance This feature was mentioned in 15 La Growth Machine reviews.

features.name: Features
features.content: Provides features to create and manage lists of potential customers

features.name: Performance
features.content: Monitors form,Aos performance and contribution to the sales pipeline

features.name: Identification
features.content: Identifies the visitor, tracks the pages that they are visiting, and the time they are spending on each page

features.name: Mobile
features.content: Records leads using different types of devices

features.name: Websites
features.content: Captures form submissions from existing forms on websites or landing pages

features.name: Social Media
features.content: Captures leads across social media channels

features.name: Data
features.content: Captures measurable, real customer data gathered directly from a website

features.name: Export/Import
features.content: Exports and imports lead data to and from various formats like plain text, spreadsheets, etc.

features.name: Reporting
features.content: Supports basic data reporting which includes user engagement analysis, entry and exit statistics, referrer information, etc.

features.name: Forms
features.content: Creates custom lead capture forms for specific uses, such as an e-book download or email newsletter

features.name: Personalization
features.content: Changes colors, calls to action, or form length to personalize lead capture

features.name: Templates

initial_reviews.review_title: Automation at the Service of Relationship Management
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
What I like best about La Growth Machine is the ability to personalize messages and processes, which allows for the reproduction of a high-quality human approach. This significantly enhances productivity.

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
What I dislike about La Growth Machine are the minor bugs that occur, as is common with all innovative applications.

What problems is La Growth Machine solving and how is that benefiting you?
La Growth Machine solves the problem of lead generation consistency. It enables a steady and recurring flow of leads, which greatly benefits our sales process by ensuring a continuous pipeline of potential clients. This consistency helps maintain momentum in our outreach efforts and ultimately drives higher conversion rates.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
Profiles. The fact that a person can have multiple profiles across multiple devices so they can run their campaigns on their collegue's systems is great!

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
The widget must be running for the campaigns to run, which makes it impossible to do overnight campaigns unless a device is open

Linkedin Automation. Due to numerous restriction on Linkedin, it is hard to find a good tool to run automated campaigns for you. This solves that issue greatly so campaigns can be run relatively easily across different devices which greatly reduces man hours

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
You can choose to combine various channels of engagement such as email, Linkedin and Twitter or mix them up. Unlike many competitors the various channels are not added to the sequence as tasks but fully automated.
You can even automate sending Linkedin voicenotes with a touch of AI to personalise the "Hey [prospect name]" at scale. Love it

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
The learning curve is there for sure but the team at LGM is always there to help and make sure you're not alone.

What problems is La Growth Machine solving and how is that benefiting you?
I don't need (or don't think I need) cold emailing at scale with various email inboxes, I'm much more focused in my outreach and LGM has helped me get better reply rates through various features they offer such as LinkedIn voicenotes for example.

initial_reviews.review_title: Must Have : Sales as a Process
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
LGM was a game-changer for me.
I like the engineering approach of considering outreach as a process. The integrations with HubSpot, Linkedin, and Gmail are working smoothly.
- API (Webhook)
- Support is very reactive
- Robust tool
-Trigger definition to change the lead status on HubSpot

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
Nothing. I've been using the tool for more than two years. In the beginning, they lacked some points, such as OOO notification follow-up, leads labeling, and central messaging ... but over time, their tech/product team has improved the product, and they are constantly seeking innovations.

What problems is La Growth Machine solving and how is that benefiting you?
Everything at one single place.
Audience selection > data enrichment > messaging > lead centralization > CRM > central messaging platform (including mail and Linkedin)

initial_reviews.review_title: Best way to scale LinkedIn and multichannel outreach
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
LGM helps our small GTM team punch above its weight in prospecting. Linkedin is a tedious and time consuming, yet effective medium to reach out to potential users and customers. LGM has saved us countless hours, likely hundreds and counting. Linkedin prospecting cannot scale infinitely, but LGM lets you scale the most of the tools we evaluated. Additionally, the enrichment capabilities it provides give us insights to help define our ICP and refine our outreach. Customer service is fast, responsive, and actually helpful.

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
The nuances of campaign set up took several trials and errors to learn. I wish we could customize campaigns to specific people. CRM integration is decent from LGM -> CRM, but not the other way around.

What problems is La Growth Machine solving and how is that benefiting you?
LGM empowers us to reach the most users directly, by utilizing the most effective channel, LinkedIn at the moment, with the most effective methods and automation.

review_question_answers.answer: LGM helps our small GTM team punch above its weight in prospecting. Linkedin prospecting cannot scale infinitely, but LGM lets you scale the most of the tools we evaluated. Additionally, the enrichment capabilities it provides give us insights to help define our ICP and refine our outreach. Customer service is fast, responsive, and actually helpful.

initial_reviews.review_title: Using LaGrowthMachine for recruitment/sourcing purposes for the past couple of years, being huge fan
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
- conditional campaigns (delaying email sending, switching to personal emails)
- multi-channel campaigns with so many option for touchpoint (linkedin, twitter, email...)
- easily switching between identities to boost engagement
- reporting is actually fairly intuitive and detailed (which is rare in the world of recruitment/HR Saas)
- support from the team is incredible! They're reactive, spot-on and always finding you the ideal solution (or at least top notch workaround)

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
- not having a chrome extension to easily import leads 1 by 1 (in sourcing I'm more on a 1 by 1 than mass mode)
- navigating identities, teammates and widget running on several campaigns/ID isn't that easy to apprehend at first
- not being able to order audience, nor campaigns by themes/team

What problems is La Growth Machine solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm mostly using LGM to run sourcing engagement campaign for recruitment purposes. I've tested several product and LGM checks all the boxes, especially with the conditional campaign option and even more with the latest features like Inbox

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
LaGrowthMachine is  a fantastic tool that can enable you to reach your goals towards B2B outreach.
I am a B2B Marketing freelancer and I have been using LGM with +40 clients since the start 2 years ago : I had never have a problem using it, and have been able to boost the sales and opportunities of all of my clients.

The + :
- Multichannel prospecting tool
- You can use API action and perform any prospecting action you need (Zapier, Make, N8N...)
- Possible to plug to any CRM
- Great customer support

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
Right now I would say that the widget is not suitable for my activity of freelancer.
I need, for each client, to make sure that they downloaded it on their desktop and that they open it everyday. If not, actions are not performing.

What problems is La Growth Machine solving and how is that benefiting you?
Generating B2B leads has never been so easy since LGM started.
I forgot almost all other softwares because everything is made so easy and intuitive with this tool.

Everything at one single place.
Audience selection > data enrichment > messaging > lead centralization > CRM > central messaging platform (including mail and Linkedin)

all_reviews.review_title: Best way to scale LinkedIn and multichannel outreach
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
LGM helps our small GTM team punch above its weight in prospecting. Linkedin is a tedious and time consuming, yet effective medium to reach out to potential users and customers. LGM has saved us countless hours, likely hundreds and counting. Linkedin prospecting cannot scale infinitely, but LGM lets you scale the most of the tools we evaluated. Additionally, the enrichment capabilities it provides give us insights to help define our ICP and refine our outreach. Customer service is fast, responsive, and actually helpful.

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
The nuances of campaign set up took several trials and errors to learn. I wish we could customize campaigns to specific people. CRM integration is decent from LGM -> CRM, but not the other way around.

What problems is La Growth Machine solving and how is that benefiting you?
LGM empowers us to reach the most users directly, by utilizing the most effective channel, LinkedIn at the moment, with the most effective methods and automation.

all_reviews.review_title: Using LaGrowthMachine for recruitment/sourcing purposes for the past couple of years, being huge fan
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
- conditional campaigns (delaying email sending, switching to personal emails)
- multi-channel campaigns with so many option for touchpoint (linkedin, twitter, email...)
- easily switching between identities to boost engagement
- reporting is actually fairly intuitive and detailed (which is rare in the world of recruitment/HR Saas)
- support from the team is incredible! They're reactive, spot-on and always finding you the ideal solution (or at least top notch workaround)

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
- not having a chrome extension to easily import leads 1 by 1 (in sourcing I'm more on a 1 by 1 than mass mode)
- navigating identities, teammates and widget running on several campaigns/ID isn't that easy to apprehend at first
- not being able to order audience, nor campaigns by themes/team

What problems is La Growth Machine solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm mostly using LGM to run sourcing engagement campaign for recruitment purposes. I've tested several product and LGM checks all the boxes, especially with the conditional campaign option and even more with the latest features like Inbox

all_reviews.review_title: Long time early user - LGM is perfect for multichannel outbound!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
- Multi-channel outbound (email, Linkedin, Twitter) : they are the only ones that allow automating multi-channel strategies!
- Target and enrich leads from LinkedIn Sales Navigator: you can easily import leads from List and searches from Sales Navigator and LGM will do the rest to finds emails, phone etc...
- The decision tree is very broad and allows to visualize the strategy easily
- Access to a lot of data to help us improve performance on a day to day basis

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
Take a bit of time to get used to the logic

Recommendations to others considering La Growth Machine:
If you need to generate leads from LinkedIn and emails on autopilot, LGM is the way to go. Lots of time saved and it replaced all other tools I used (PhantomBuster, DropContact, Lemlist etc...)

What problems is La Growth Machine solving and how is that benefiting you?
I was used to old fashion mail sequences tools and it was working just fine. But when I discovered LGM and its multi-channels sequences with Linkedin and eMail, Hubspot integration, clear and easy-to-use platform and set ups, I jumped at it ! And the results are great : 2 meetings/week/sales reps, Leads are more likely to answer via Linkedin and our approach is more personal and human. Super cool to work with the LGM Team, expert and fun !

all_reviews.review_title: Way more efficient than Email Outreach Campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about La Growth Machine?
It's so simple to create multi-channel workflows

What do you dislike about La Growth Machine?
Number of automation per day depends on the channel you use.

What problems is La Growth Machine solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our prospects are over-solicited...we needed to find a way to engage with them "differently".

Of course, copywriting is key, but being able to engage with my prospects on LinkedIn, then switch to Email if they don't answer while adding small interactions on Twitter was key to our campaign success.

Moreover, using LGM we've been able to reduce time to create campaigns thanks to their automatic enrichment process. We just import our prospect from LinkedIn in one click, then LGM will search for their Twitter, Email & Phone number automatically. We don't even need to create the database.

At the end of the day, we created our campaigns in less than one hour from A to Z, and get 3.5 more answers than using regular email campaigns.

We love LGM.
